item.title: Next event
item.description:
Next event

Hot on the heels of handing over the controls to Critical Music to give our new VOID soundsystem a proper work out, we bring you something a little different. Dancefloor favourites Annix, the duo made up of Konichi & Decimal Bass, will be joined on the one’s and two's by special guest TI to launch their album “Forever”. This will sell out, don't sleep on the half price early birds.

item.title: Aperture 19.2 Annix & T>I
item.description:
Aperture 19.2 Annix & T>I

After handing over the controls to Critical Music to give our new VOID soundsystem a proper work out we bring you something a little different. Dancefloor favourites Annix, the duo made up of Konichi & Decimal Bass, will be joined on the one's and two's by special guest T>I to launch their album "Forever".

item.title: Annix - Forever
item.description:
Annix - Forever

When Annix's debut album 'Inception' came out back in 2013 it was one of the most hotly tipped album releases on the dnb calendar. Now Cheltenham duo Konichi and Decimal Bass return with a second album 'Forever' - which sees them a little older, wiser, but still as darn well talented.

item.title: T>I - HI-Z - CO-LAB FORTHCOMING by Co-Lab Recordings UK
item.description:
T>I - HI-Z - CO-LAB FORTHCOMING by Co-Lab Recordings UK

Forthcoming on T>I's brand new EP on Co-Lab early 2016
